cab.content: (THIS DOCuMSKT IS THE PROPERTY, OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY^ GOVERNMENT.^4S ECRET.7-:-WAR CABINET.G.T. - 3020COMPULSORY RATIONING.Copy of letter from Secretary, West London Co-Operat ive So plot y tr "Se^etfcsy ... Cabinet243 - 245", Lawee Road,Fulham,London, S.W.6.14th December, 191?. ear Sir,I am directed to forward you resolution which was passed at a well attended meeting of the members of our Society in the Southfields district, and I shall be favoured if you will kindly give it your consideration. .Yours faithfully,(Signed) G, COFFIN.'Secretary.The Secretary of the War Cabinet, 10, Downing Street, London, S.W.-1;-COPY OF RESOLUTION."That this meeting of members of the Southfields Branch of the West London Co-operative Society is of opinion that to ensure an equitable distribution of food supplies amongst the population of the United Kingdom, a"scheme of food rationing should be adopted by the Government and made compulsory."
